document.docAuthor: Williams, Bronwyn W. & Weaver, Patricia G.
document.masterDocTitle: A historical review of the taxonomy and classification of Entocytheridae (Crustacea: Ostracoda: Podocopida)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A historical review of the taxonomy and classification of Entocytheridae (Crustacea: Ostracoda: Podocopida)

subSubSection.paragraph:
1903
Entocythere cambaria
(nov. spec.).—Marshall: 117–135, 137–145, Pls. X–XIII, Figs. 1 –30, all by implication [see Remarks] (D, E, H, R, T).

1912
Entocythere cambaria Wm. S. Marsh. 1903
.—Müller: XXVII, 317, 402, 430 (C, D, H, T).

1930
Entocythere cambaria Wm. S. Marshall 1903
.—Klie: 272 (H, R).

1933
Entocythere cambaria Marshall.
—Allen: 119, 120, not
E . cambaria
sensu stricto
; identity unknown (D, H).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
1940c Eutocythere
cambaria Marshall.
— Rioja : 57, erroneous spelling (C).

subSubSection.paragraph:
1941
Entocythere cambaria Marshall.
—Hobbs: 4, not
E . cambaria
sensu stricto
(D, E, H).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
1941b
Entocythere cambaria
.— Rioja : 193, 194, 195, 196, 197, Fig. 1B (C, H, R, T).

subSubSection.paragraph:
1942b
Entocythere ( E. ) cambaria Marshall 1903
.—Hoff: 63, 64, 66, 67, 69 (C, K, R, T).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
1942b E.
( E. ) Cambaria Marshall 1903
.— Rioja : 686 [ lapsus calami ], 695 (K, R).

subSubSection.paragraph:
1953
Entocythere cambaria
.—Rioja: 287, not
E . cambaria
sensu stricto
(C).

1959
Entocythere cambaria Marshall 1903
.—Tressler: 727, 728, Fig. 28.184a, b (H, K, T).

1962
Entocythere cambaria Marshall 1903
.—Hart: 121, 126, 133, 145, Fig. 6 (C, D, T).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
1971
Entocythere cambaria
Marshall, 1903 : 120
.—Hart, D.G. & Hart: 115, lapsus calami [see Remarks, below] (C).

subSubSection.paragraph:
1974
Entocythere cambaria Marshall 1903
.—Hart & Hart: frontispiece [iv], 1, 8, 14, 17, 83, 84–85, 201, 227, Pl. XXV Figs. 3–4, Pl. LI (C, D, H, K, T).

1975
Entocythere cambaria Marshall, 1903
.—Hart & Hart: 30–31 (C, D, H).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
1977
Entocythere cambaria
Marshall, 1903 :120
.—Hobbs & Peters: 2 [not
E . cambaria
sensu stricto
], 47 (C). 1985
Entocythere cambaria
.—Hart et al .: 4, 6 (C, E, R).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: The only time the species epithet
cambaria
is mentioned in Marshall (1903) is in the title; the genus name,
Entocythere
, is used exclusively throughout.
Entocythere cambaria
, referenced in p. 115, line 4 of Hart, D.G. & Hart (1971) is a mistake, and should follow the genus diagnosis,
Entocythere
, on the preceding page; this error is also pointed out by Hart & Hart (1974: 84) .
